scripts.start: npm run build-css:watch & npm run build-vendor & budo src/main.coffee:dist/app.js --no-debug --live --port 3000 -- -t coffeeify -x=vue
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm run build-app && NODE_ENV=production npm run build-vendor && npm run build-css:build && hashly ./dist ./dist && node hash-replacer.js
scripts.build-app: browserify -t coffeeify src/main.coffee --external=vue | uglifyjs -c warnings=false -m > dist/app.js
